### Rmarkdown Purpose

The purpose of this Rmarkdown is to create a 1km x 1km dot grid across the aquifers of interest to my study.

Loading necessary packages.
```{r}
library(sf)
```


### Creating 1km x 1km grid
```{r}
aq_shapefile <- st_read("../input/processed/aquifer_shapefiles/all_18_aquifers.shp")

# making the shapefile an sf object
sf_aq_polygon <- st_as_sf(aq_shapefile, crs = 5070)

aq_grid <- st_make_grid(
        sf_aq_polygon,
        cellsize = 1000, # 1km x 1km grid cells
        what = "centers",
        square = TRUE
      )

point_grid <- st_sf(geometry = aq_grid, crs = 5070)

aq_point_grid <- point_grid[
        st_join(point_grid, sf_aq_polygon, left = FALSE),
      ]

st_write(aq_point_grid, "../output/point_grid/aq_point_grid.shp")
```
